FixedColumns

Left and Right Fixed Columns
FixedColumns allows columns to be fixed from both the left and the right hand sides of the table.

Right Fixed Column
FixedColumns has the ability to freeze columns on both the left and the right hand sides of the table. By default it will fix the first column on the left, but using the initialization parameters
